content: Mengfei RenMengfei RenAssistant ProfessorDepartment of Computer ScienceBaylor UniversityAbout MeI am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Baylor University. I received my Ph.D. degrees in Computer Science from The University of Texas at Arlington. Prior to joining Baylor, I was an Assistant Professor in the Dept. of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Alabama in Huntsville.My research focuses on Software Engineering. Specifically, I am dedicated to developing comprehensive analysis and testing frameworks to enhance correctness and robustness of IoT ecosystems, modern compilers and ad-hoc ecosystems.
